decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s) PL2/SM/3084 - 01 (Location Plan, Block Plan); PL2/SM/3084 - 01 (Existing Floor Plans, Existing Elevations); PL2/SM/3084 - 02 rev A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PL2/SM/3084 - 03 rev A (Proposed First Floor Plan); PL2/SM/3084 - 04 rev A (Proposed Elevations); PL2/SM/3084 - 05 rev A (Existing and Proposed Roof Plans)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), SPD4 (Residential Extensions) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Part single, part two storey rear extension; Part single, part two storey side extension
